title.narrative: Danish Church Aid activities in Syria and the region, 2020

description.narrative: Danish Church Aid activities in Syria and the region, 2020 Saving lives and strengthening self-protection through improved safety and dignity of conflict-affected communities and forcibly displaced people in Northeast Syria, Kurdish Region of Iraq and Lebanon.

The grant supports the DanChuchAid project: Syria, Iraq, Lebanon Saving lives and strengthening self-protection through improved safety and dignity of conflict-affected communities and forcibly displaced people in Northeast Syria, Kurdish Region of Iraq and Lebanon.Strengthened protection and resilience of 42,200 crisis-affected people in Syria and Lebanon
The overall stated objective of the programme is: To strengthen self-protection and resilience to promote safety and dignity through the provision of life-saving support, improved risk reduction capacities, and increased access to vital humanitarian and protection services for vulnerable communities in the target areas in Syria, Iraq and Lebanon.
